name: University of Pretoria
headAddress: c/o Roper Street and Lynnwood Road
goal: We are a higher education institution with the main activities being teaching and learning, research and community engagement.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: We partner with European academic institutions and receive funding from organisations for research
